name: Mathematics
description: Explore the world of numbers, equations, and shapes in Mathematics.

name: Chemistry
description: Discover the wonders of chemical compounds and reactions in Chemistry.

name: Physics
description: Uncover the principles governing the physical universe, from atoms to galaxies, in Physics.

name: Biology
description: Understand the complexities of living organisms and ecosystems in Biology.

name: History
description: Uncover the stories of the past and understand how they shape our present in History.

name: Polity
description: Learn about the principles, practices, and institutions of governance in Polity.

name: Economics
description: Dive into the study of production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services in Economics.

name: Reasoning
description: Sharpen your critical thinking and problem-solving skills with exercises in Reasoning.

name: Geography
description: Explore the Earth's landscapes, environments, and phenomena in Geography.

name: English
description: Master the language of Shakespeare and modern literature in English.

name: Hindi
description: Embrace the beauty and richness of one of India's official languages in Hindi.

name: General Knowledge
description: Broaden your understanding of the world with facts and trivia in General Knowledge.
